gw.api.admin

Class GroupUserUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.GroupUserUtil

  • public class GroupUserUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for manipulating a user's groups.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroupUserUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void add(User user, GroupUser gu)
      Uses the given GroupUser object to link the given user to the GroupUser's group.
      static void remove(User user, Group group)
      Breaks the link between the given user and group by removing the corresponding GroupUser object from the group's list of GroupUsers.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupUserUtil

        public GroupUserUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static void add(User user,
       GroupUser gu)
        Uses the given GroupUser object to link the given user to the GroupUser's group. Does nothing if the given group user is null. Otherwise sets the GroupUser's user field to the given user and then adds the GroupUser to its group's list of GroupUsers. Does not commit the change.
        Parameters:
        user - a non null User.
        gu - a possibly null GroupUser. If non-null, it must have a non null Group field specifying the Group to which the user is to be linked.

      • remove

        public static void remove(User user,
          Group group)
        Breaks the link between the given user and group by removing the corresponding GroupUser object from the group's list of GroupUsers. Does nothing if the group does not have a GroupUser that corresponds to the given user. Does not commit the change.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be removed.
        group - the group from which the user is to be removed.
